name: NoDupeMessage
short: Removes duplicate messages sent across multiple channels and mutes repeat offenders.
description: Monitors messages guild-wide and removes any message a user sends in more than one channel within a configurable time window. Issues warnings and escalates to a Discord timeout after a configurable number of violations. Common short replies (yes, no, ok, thanks, etc.) are never flagged.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores no persistent user data. Violation counts are held in memory only and are cleared on bot restart.
